Language.summary: Language is an identity of one of the languages that are supported by the application.

CreatedAtUtc.summary: Shows the date when the entity has been created.

BookId.summary: Identifier of a book. It should be returned when uploading a new book or it can be viewed when querying books.

Description.summary: The human-readable description of the book (like title or author) to distinguish it from the other books.

ProcessingStatus.summary: Status of the Import of the book, whether it's imported to the system or not.
